title: Note number 3
body: What happens if I keep adding notes so that they will be larger than the window which both displays note in the admin and on the slideshow????

title: Note number 2
body:
Another super interesting and super important note that everyone should see and this one is longer to test how the line break works.

And this is a new paragraph which will also be longer because this is a very long note because someone needed to write a lot of information and it is very important that all the details are correct!
